I called Carpet Depot to get a quote for replacing the carpets in three rooms of my house. Kevin came out promptly, measured the spaces, and brought a selection of samples. He was thorough in answering all my questions. Although the exact carpet I was looking for wasn‚Äôt in his samples, he invited me to visit their store to explore more options.

I visited the store on March 20th and worked with Leslie, who was incredibly knowledgeable and polite. She helped me find a carpet I absolutely fell in love with. I didn‚Äôt make a decision right away because I was planning to get another quote from a different company the next day.

What ultimately convinced me to go with Carpet Depot was Kevin‚Äôs insight about the need to shave my doors, given the higher grade of carpet and padding I chose. The competitive and reasonable price sealed the deal.

The installation was scheduled for March 29th, and Leslie arranged for their best installer, Jose, to handle the job. I was genuinely impressed with how carefully and efficiently he moved the furniture. The installation went smoothly, and the results exceeded my expectations.

Kevin was there and he helped me with the carpet. He too was helpful, friendly and professional. I went back a few days later and picked the carpet. It was installed a few days later and I loved it. Several months later it started showing a dark streak down the middle. I went and told them about it. Kevin came and looked and he said he would file a  claim. He said he wanted me to be happy. The claim was denied but Kevin said it would be replaced. I was surprised for sure. I now have my replaced carpet and it's beautiful and I love it. I will let everyone know to go to carpet depot because it is a great place. Wonderful customer service and thanks so much to Kevin and Leslie.
